help.title: Help
help.description: Automatically clear messages in Discord channels on a schedule.
help.permissions_for_bot: **For Bot:** View Channel, Send Messages, Send Messages in Threads, Read Message History, Manage Messages, Embed Links, Use Application Commands
help.select_command: Select a command to learn more...

change.success: ‚úÖ Server timezone has been set to **{timezone}**
change.success_auto: ‚úÖ Server timezone has been automatically detected and set to **{timezone}**

list.title: üåç Available Timezones
list.description: Here are the configured timezone abbreviations and their full names:

current.title: Current Server Timezone
current.benefit_1: ‚Ä¢ Users can set timers with just time: `/subscription add 21:30`
current.benefit_2: ‚Ä¢ The server timezone will be used automatically
current.benefit_3: ‚Ä¢ Users can still override: `/subscription add 21:30 PST`
current.change_hint: To change the timezone, use `/timezone change <timezone>`
current.no_timezone_description: This server doesn't have a default timezone configured. When users create timers without specifying a timezone, UTC will be used.
current.set_hint: Use `/timezone change <timezone>` to set a default timezone.
current.list_hint: Use `/timezone list` to see available timezones.

list.title: üåê Available Languages
list.description: The bot currently supports the following languages:
list.change_hint: Use `/language change <language>` to change the server language

change.success: ‚úÖ Server language has been changed to **{language}**
change.already_set: ‚ÑπÔ∏è The server language is already set to **{language}**

add.success: ‚úÖ Successfully subscribed {channel} to automatic message clearing every **{timer}**
add.success_with_ignored:
‚úÖ Successfully subscribed {channel} to automatic message clearing every **{timer}**

**Ignored targets added:** {count}
add.already_subscribed:
‚ùå {channel} is already subscribed with a {timer} timer.
Use `/subscription update` to change the timer.

remove.success: ‚úÖ Successfully unsubscribed {channel} from automatic message clearing

list.title: üìã Active Subscriptions
list.no_subscriptions: No active subscriptions in this server

info.title: Subscription Information
info.commands_hint: Use `/subscription` commands to manage this subscription

update.success_with_ignored:
‚úÖ Successfully updated timer for {channel} to **{timer}**

**Ignored targets added:** {count}

clear.in_progress: ‚è≥ A clear is already in progress for {channel}. Please wait for it to complete.

ignore.message_added: ‚úÖ Message from {author} will be **ignored** during clearing in {channel}
ignore.message_removed: ‚úÖ Message from {author} will **no longer be ignored** during clearing in {channel}
ignore.user_added: ‚úÖ {user}'s messages will be **ignored** during clearing in {channel}
ignore.user_removed: ‚úÖ {user}'s messages will **no longer be ignored** during clearing in {channel}

skip.success:
‚úÖ Next scheduled clear for {channel} has been skipped.
**New next clear:** {next_clear}

permission_denied.title: Owner Only
permission_denied.description: This command is restricted to the bot owner.

list.title: Bot Administrators
list.no_admins_hint: Use `/owner admin add` to add administrators

add.success_description: Successfully added **{username}** as a bot administrator.
add.success_note: This user can now use admin commands
add.already_description: User `{user_id}` is already a bot administrator.
add.self_description: You are the bot owner and already have full permissions.
add.self_note: No need to add yourself as an administrator

remove.success_note: This user can no longer use admin commands
remove.not_found_description: User `{user_id}` is not a bot administrator.
remove.not_found_note: Cannot remove someone who isn't an admin

reload.single_note_3: ‚Ä¢ Guilds on this shard temporarily offline
reload.all_note_3: ‚Ä¢ All shards relaunch with fresh state
reload.all_hint: Use `/owner shard reload <id>` to reload single shard only
reload.not_sharded_description: Bot is running in single-instance mode (not sharded).
reload.not_sharded_hint: Use `/owner shard reload` to reload the bot
reload.invalid_id_note: Please specify a valid shard ID
reload.signal_sent_note: Note: Cross-shard communication is not yet implemented.
reload.signal_sent_future: Future updates will enable automatic cross-shard reloading
reload.failed_note: Please check the logs for more details

permission_denied.title: Admin Only
permission_denied.description: This command is restricted to the bot admins.

stats.title: Bot Statistics
stats.not_found_description: Server ID `{server_id}` was not found in the database.
stats.not_found_note: This server has never been subscribed to the bot.

add.success_note_2: ‚Ä¢ The server cannot use bot commands

remove.success_note: The server can now use bot commands again.

check.not_found_description: Server `{server_id}` is not on the blacklist.
check.not_found_note: This server can use bot commands normally.
check.found_note: This server cannot use bot commands.

error.delete_success_description: Error `{error_id}` has been deleted from the database.
error.delete_failed_note: It may not exist or has already been deleted.
error.list_hint: Use `/admin error check <id>` to see full details
error.no_errors_description: No errors found in the database.
error.no_errors_note: Errors will appear here when they occur
error.clear_success_note: The error log is now empty
error.clear_failed_description: Failed to clear errors from database.
error.clear_failed_note: Please check the logs for more details

force.not_found_description: No server or channel found with ID: `{target_id}`
force.not_found_note: Please check the ID and try again
force.server_success_note: The server can subscribe channels again using `/subscription add`
force.channel_success_note: The channel can be subscribed again using `/subscription add`

timer_view.title: Active Timer for {channel}
timer_view.auto_update: This message updates automatically after each clear.

user_not_found.title: User Not Found
user_not_found.description: User with ID `{user_id}` not found in this server.
user_not_found.help: Please make sure the user is a member of this server.

message_not_found.title: Message Not Found
message_not_found.description: Message with ID `{message_id}` not found in {channel}.
message_not_found.help: Please make sure the message exists in the specified channel.

errors.bot_missing_permissions: ‚ùå The bot is missing required permissions: {permissions}
errors.invalid_timer:
‚ùå Invalid timer format: `{timer}`

Please use formats like:
‚Ä¢ `24h` for 24 hours
‚Ä¢ `1d12h30m` for 1 day, 12 hours, 30 minutes
‚Ä¢ `15:30 EST` for daily at 3:30 PM EST
errors.invalid_target: ‚ùå Invalid target. Please provide a valid message ID/link or user mention/ID.
errors.channel_in_progress: ‚è≥ A clear is already in progress for {channel}. Please wait for it to complete.
errors.next_time_not_found: ‚ùå Could not determine the next scheduled time for {channel}
errors.missed_clear_notification:
‚ö†Ô∏è **Missed Clear Notification**

A scheduled message clear was missed for this channel.
The timer has been rescheduled.

validation.blacklisted: ‚ùå This server has been blacklisted and cannot use this bot.
validation.blacklisted_detailed:
‚ùå **Server Blacklisted**

This server has been blacklisted and cannot use this bot.

If you believe this is a mistake, please contact support.
validation.insufficient_permissions: ‚ùå You need the `Manage Messages` permission to use this command.
validation.insufficient_permissions_detailed:
‚ùå **Insufficient Permissions**

You need the following permission to use this command:
{permissions}

Please contact a server administrator if you need access.
validation.bot_missing_permissions: ‚ùå I'm missing the following permissions in {channel}: {permissions}
validation.bot_missing_permissions_detailed:
‚ùå **Bot Missing Permissions**

I'm missing the following permissions in {channel}:
{permissions}

Please grant these permissions and try again.
validation.channel_already_subscribed: ‚ùå {channel} already has a timer set. Use `/subscription update` to update the subscription instead.
validation.channel_already_subscribed_detailed:
‚ùå **Channel Already Subscribed**

{channel} already has a timer set.

Use `/subscription update` to update the subscription instead.
validation.not_subscribed:
‚ùå **Channel Not Subscribed**

{channel} is not subscribed to automatic message clearing.

Use `/subscription add` to set up automatic clearing first.
validation.permission_denied: ‚ùå You need the **{permission}** permission to use this command.
validation.blacklisted_server:
‚ùå **Server Blacklisted**

This server has been blacklisted and cannot use this bot.

If you believe this is a mistake, you can appeal the blacklist on our [Support Server](https://biast12.com/botsupport).
validation.no_permissions: ‚ùå You need the **{permission}** permission to use this command.
validation.bot_no_permissions: ‚ùå I need the following permissions in {channel}: {permissions}
validation.already_subscribed:
‚ùå {channel} is already subscribed with a {timer} timer.
Use `/subscription update` to change the timer.
validation.invalid_channel: ‚ùå Please provide a valid text channel.
